content_html:
Bagmati, September 17

The Speaker of the Bagmati Province Assembly, Bhuvan Kumar Pathak, has resigned from his post today. He has submitted his resignation letter to the Deputy Speaker, Apsara Chapagain.

Speaker Pathak has mentioned in his resignation letter that he has tendered resignation from his post in accordance with the provisions of the Constitution of Nepal and the Provincial Assembly Rules 2074 BS.

The post Bagmati province assembly speaker resigns appeared first on OnlineKhabar English News.

title: Bagmati province assembly speaker resigns
